Rinkside.Description: Seats closest to the ice for an immersive game experience.
Rinkside.View_Quality: Direct view of the action, offering an engaging and immersive experience.
Rinkside.Unique_Features: Opportunities for player interactions and a high chance of being featured on TV.
Rinkside.Accessibility: Convenient access, though space for personal mobility devices may be limited.
Rinkside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to premium lounges, complimentary dining and beverages.

Club_Seats.Description: Fantastic side view of the game with additional benefits.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views ensuring a clear line of sight to the ice.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Extra legroom, less crowded sections for a comfortable experience.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Easily accessible, with dedicated entrances and close proximity to elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive clubs and in-seat service.

Center_Balcony.Description: A panoramic view of the game from an elevated vantage point.
Center_Balcony.View_Quality: Wide view of the arena, ideal for fans who enjoy analyzing the game.
Center_Balcony.Unique_Features: An affordable option for fans wanting a full view of the game.
Center_Balcony.Accessibility: Accessible seating options available, with elevator access to balcony level.
Center_Balcony.Special_Perks: A cost-effective choice with a comprehensive view of the ice.

Loge_Level.Description: Above the action, offering close views with the comfort of elevation.
Loge_Level.View_Quality: Near to the ice with a slightly elevated angle for a detailed view of the game.
Loge_Level.Unique_Features: A balance of proximity to the ice and a favorable pricing point.
Loge_Level.Special_Perks: A perfect blend of price, view, and exclusivity.

restaurants_bars.name: UBS Arena Concessions
restaurants_bars.description: Within UBS Arena, offering a wide range of dining options from classic game day fare to gourmet meals, catering to all tastes.

restaurants_bars.name: Belmont Tavern
restaurants_bars.description: A local favorite near UBS Arena, known for its vibrant atmosphere, extensive beer selection, and delicious pub grub.

restaurants_bars.name: King Umberto
restaurants_bars.description: A renowned Italian restaurant offering a cozy dining experience with exquisite dishes and fine wines, a short drive from the arena.

restaurants_bars.name: Rialto Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: Offering modern American cuisine in a chic setting, Rialto is perfect for a pre-game dinner or a post-game celebration.

accommodations.name: The Westin New York at Times Square
accommodations.address: 270 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
accommodations.description: An upscale hotel offering sophisticated rooms, a fitness center, and dining options, conveniently located in the heart of Times Square.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park
accommodations.description: A modern hotel offering stylish rooms with city views, a fitness center, and dining options, close to Central Park and Times Square.

accommodations.name: The New Yorker, A Wyndham Hotel
accommodations.description: An iconic hotel offering chic rooms, a fitness center, and multiple dining options, within walking distance to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: The Plaza
accommodations.description: A historic luxury hotel offering opulent rooms, fine dining, and sweeping views of Central Park, located near Fifth Avenue's luxury shops.

accommodations.name: Conrad New York Downtown
accommodations.address: 102 North End Ave, New York, NY 10282, USA
accommodations.description: A luxury hotel offering contemporary suites, a rooftop bar, and upscale dining, situated in the heart of Lower Manhattan, near Wall Street and the One World Observatory.

tourist_attractions.name: Statue of Liberty
tourist_attractions.address: Liberty Island, New York, NY 10004, USA
tourist_attractions.description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York Harbor, symbolizing freedom and democracy.

tourist_attractions.name: Central Park
tourist_attractions.description: A sprawling urban oasis in the heart of Manhattan, offering walking paths, boat rentals, and cultural attractions.

tourist_attractions.name: Empire State Building
tourist_attractions.address: 20 W 34th St, New York, NY 10118, USA
tourist_attractions.description: An iconic Art Deco skyscraper with observation decks offering panoramic views of New York City.

tourist_attractions.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: One of the world's largest and most prestigious art museums, featuring an extensive collection from all corners of the globe.

tourist_attractions.name: Broadway
tourist_attractions.description: The heart of the American theatre industry, offering a myriad of theatrical performances.

tourist_attractions.name: Brooklyn Bridge
tourist_attractions.description: A historic suspension bridge connecting Manhattan and Brooklyn, offering picturesque views and a pedestrian walkway.

tourist_attractions.name: The High Line
tourist_attractions.description: A linear park built on a historic freight rail line elevated above the streets on Manhattanâ€™s West Side.

tourist_attractions.name: Times Square
tourist_attractions.description: A major commercial and entertainment center in Midtown Manhattan, known for its bright lights and Broadway theatres.

tourist_attractions.name: Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
tourist_attractions.address: 11 W 53rd St, New York, NY 10019, USA
tourist_attractions.description: An influential museum dedicated to modern and contemporary art, featuring works by Van Gogh, Warhol, and many others.

tourist_attractions.name: One World Observatory
tourist_attractions.address: 117 West St, New York, NY 10006, USA
tourist_attractions.description: Located atop the One World Trade Center, it offers breathtaking views of New York City and beyond from the highest point in the Western Hemisphere.

team_related_activities.name: Nassau Coliseum Tours
team_related_activities.description: Discover the history and legacy of the New York Islanders with guided tours of Nassau Coliseum, including highlights of iconic moments and player achievements.

team_related_activities.name: UBS Arena Tours
team_related_activities.description: Experience a behind-the-scenes look at the UBS Arena, the new home of the New York Islanders, featuring state-of-the-art facilities and exclusive areas such as the team's locker room.

team_related_activities.name: Islanders Team Store
team_related_activities.address: UBS Arena, 2400 Hempstead Turnpike, Elmont, NY 11003
team_related_activities.description: Visit the official Islanders Team Store at the UBS Arena for exclusive merchandise, memorabilia, and apparel, celebrating the team's history and current roster.

options.description: The New York City Subway system offers convenient access to the UBS Arena and Nassau Coliseum, with stations nearby facilitating easy travel from across the city.
New York's extensive bus network provides direct access to UBS Arena and Nassau Coliseum, ensuring easy travel from various parts of Long Island and New York City.
The Long Island Rail Road (LIRR) offers direct service to Belmont Park Station, providing convenient access to the UBS Arena for fans traveling from Long Island and NYC.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official New York Islanders Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all Islanders ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best selection of seats.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for the New York Islanders, providing a secure platform for purchasing official tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable secondary marketplace for Islanders tickets, offering a fanProtect guarantee.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
